reviews.name: ninXout
reviews.message: As someone who has been using Editor Collab since 2.1, I can't recommend it enough! It felt super natural to use, which I didn't expect for a mod of this scale.

reviews.name: itsccrysx
reviews.message: Im in love with how Editor Collab smoothly allows me to collaborate with other people, Currently creating a level with it and there has been no problems so far.

reviews.name: kiannuh
reviews.message: Editor Collab is a one-of-a-kind mod! It provides a very enjoyable creating experience with your friends, and it's super hands-on. Highly recommended.

reviews.name: rifct
reviews.message: Super cool mod! Makes creating levels so much more fun with friends in real time, especially with the Globed integration :)
